media:group.media:title: Saksi Express: October 12, 2020 [HD]
media:group.media:description:
Narito ang mga balitang ating sinaksihan ngayong Lunes, October 12, 2020:
- Cayetano at Velasco face off, inaabangan sa special session ng Kamara bukas
- Bangkay ng lalaki, natagpuan at hinihinalang inanod sa isang creek
- Rep. Velasco, iniluklok ng 186 kongresista bilang Speaker; Cayetano, tinawag itong "fake session"
- Virus na nagdudulot ng COVID-19, 28 days daw kayang mabuhay sa glass, stainless steel at perang papel
- Pre-registration sa Philippine ID System na magpapadali raw sa pamimigay ng ayuda, sinimulan na
- Lalaking hinostage ang sarili, sugatan matapos barilin ng mga pulis
For Kapuso abroad, subscribe to GMA Pinoy TV (http://www.gmapinoytv.com/) for GMA programs, including the full version of Saksi.
Saksi is GMA Network's late night newscast, anchored by GMA News pillar Arnold Clavio, and Pia Arcangel, featuring top news stories from the Philippines. Saksi is now in its 25th year. Visit GMA News Online (http://www.gmanews.tv) for more.
